result.eng: I'll see you at four o'clock.

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: It is four miles from An Cheathrú Rua to Ros an Mhíl.
result.ga: tá sé ceithre mhíle ón gceathrú rua go ros an mhíl
result.orig: tá sé ceithre mhíle ón gceathrú rua go ros an mhíl

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
